name: ABISS

abilities.name: Flame Strike
abilities.description: Deal ⊗ damage to target Familiar

flavorText: Born from the depths of volcanic fury, ABISS commands the primal forces of fire.

name: Tidal Guardian

abilities.name: Healing Wave
abilities.description: Restore ⊗ health to target Familiar

flavorText: The ocean's embrace protects those who respect its power.

name: Stone Caller

abilities.name: Summon Boulder
abilities.description: Create a 0/⊗ Boulder token

flavorText: The earth answers to those who understand its ancient language.

name: Wind Dancer

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Return target Familiar with cost ⊗ or less to its owner's hand

flavorText: Swift as the wind, elusive as a whisper.

name: Void Walker

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Remove target card from play. Return it at end of turn.

flavorText: Between existence and nothingness lies infinite possibility.

abilities.name: Lightning Strike
abilities.description: Deal ⊗ damage to any target

name: Healing Spring

abilities.name: Restore
abilities.description: Restore ⊗ health to all your Familiars

flavorText: Life flows eternal from the sacred springs.

name: Void Rift

abilities.name: Banish
abilities.description: Remove target Familiar from play permanently

flavorText: Some things are better left forgotten.

name: Crystal Orb

abilities.name: Scrying
abilities.description: Look at the top ⊗ cards of your deck

flavorText: The future reveals itself to those who know how to look.

name: Banner of Flames

abilities.name: Flame Mastery
abilities.description: Your Fire Familiars get +1/+0

abilities.name: Burning Aura
abilities.description: Whenever a Fire Familiar enters play, deal 1 damage to target opponent

flavorText: Under this banner, the flames of war never die.

name: Tidal Standard

abilities.name: Flow Mastery
abilities.description: Your Water Familiars get +0/+1

abilities.name: Cleansing Tide
abilities.description: At the start of your turn, restore 1 health to all your Familiars

flavorText: The tide rises and falls, but the ocean endures.

name: Mountain's Heart

abilities.name: Stone Mastery
abilities.description: Your Earth Familiars get +0/+2

abilities.name: Enduring Strength
abilities.description: Earth Familiars you control cannot be removed from play by spells

flavorText: Rooted deep, standing tall, enduring all.

name: Shadow Assassin

abilities.name: Stealth Strike
abilities.description: This Familiar cannot be blocked if defending player has ⊗ or fewer Familiars

flavorText: Death comes silently in the night.

name: Dragon Lord

abilities.name: Dragon's Breath
abilities.description: Deal ⊗ damage to all enemy Familiars

abilities.name: Aerial Dominance
abilities.description: Other Flying Familiars you control get +1/+1

flavorText: Sovereign of the skies, master of flame.

name: Mystic Sage

abilities.name: Arcane Knowledge
abilities.description: Draw ⊗ cards

abilities.name: Spell Mastery
abilities.description: Your spells cost ⊗ less to cast

flavorText: Knowledge is the greatest power of all.
